Discover luxury apartments in Jersey City at The BLVD Collection. Enjoy upscale finishes, walk-in closets, windows with NYC and Statue of Liberty views, a fitness suite, spin studio, golf simulator, hydroponic farm, coworking space, resort-style pool, kids playroom, pet-friendly amenities and more.

Experience Jersey City luxury living at BLVD 401. This distinguished residence offers premium amenities, including unique features like a state-of-the-art hydroponic farm and professional golf simulator. Indulge in spacious floor plans with breathtaking views that redefine upscale apartment living in the New York metro area.

Elevate your lifestyle at BLVD 425, where luxury meets innovation in Jersey Cityâs premier apartment collection. This exceptional residence features a cutting-edge hydroponic farm and immersive golf simulator among its curated amenities. Discover a perfect balance of elegance and comfort in these sought-after residences overlooking the vibrant NYC skyline.

Welcome to BLVD 475. Meticulously designed with premium finishes and expansive living spaces, these sophisticated apartments offer an unparalleled living experience. The distinctive residence features a showstopping karaoke room, perfect for entertaining guests in style, as well as a pet grooming station for your furry friends.

    The Neighborhood

    The Newport area of Jersey City offers easy rail access to NYC. This multicultural community features city views, local dining and nightlife. Residents enjoy the Newark Avenue Pedestrian Plaza and the Newport Centre mall, offering nearby boutiques, grocers, parks and entertainment.

    The Neighborhood

    The Newport area of Jersey City offers easy rail access to NYC. This multicultural community features city views, local dining and nightlife. Residents enjoy the Newark Avenue Pedestrian Plaza and the Newport Centre mall, offering nearby boutiques, grocers, parks and entertainment.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    building related faqs

    lease related faqs

    What is the pet policy?

    Veris Residential communities welcome domestic cats and dogs of all breeds and sizes. Pets must be registered with the leasing office. All dogs must be kept on a leash while in common areas throughout the community.

    What is the smoking policy?

    All Veris Residential communities are 100% smoke-free. Smoking or vaping any tobacco or marijuana products in our buildings or common areas is strictly prohibited for the health and safety of our residents.

    How do residents accept mail and packages?

    The BLVD Collectionâs on-site concierge offers convenient mail and package delivery.

    How do urban beehives benefit the BLVD Collection and its residents?

    The BLVD Collectionâs beehives, professionally managed by AlvÃ©ole, create more than just a buzz; they boost offer residents a unique glimpse into beekeeping with engaging workshops and provide fresh honey that reflects the flavors of the neighborhoodâall while affirming our commitment to promoting environmental stewardship and enhancing community spirit among our residents.

    What features are unique to each tower in the BLVD Collection?

    Each building in The BLVD Collection provides unique amenities and apartment features for its residents. Offerings include BLVD 401 and BLVD 425âs golf simulator, sky bar and sky terrace and BLVD 475â karaoke room.

    How can residents get involved with the hydroponic farm?

    Through Veris Residentialâs partnership with Green Food Solutions, residents of BLVD 401 and BLVD 425 can access a cutting-edge hydroponic farm that doesnât just grow greensâit cultivates community. Residents receive fresh, locally sourced produce right where they live, reinvigorating the âfarm-to-tableâ experience in a deliciously sustainable way. By growing herbs and vegetables on-site, weâre reducing food miles and empowering our residents to embrace eco-friendly urban farming methods with interactive community workshops.

    What parking options are available to residents and guests?

    Residents can reserve a space in The BLVD Collectionâs on-site garage for easy and convenient parking. For an additional cost, guests may register with the concierge to receive a twenty-four-hour parking pass.

    Has The BLVD Collection received any Green Certifications?

    BLVD 401 is LEED CertifiedÂ®. All buildings in The BLVD Collection have received the WELL Health-Safety Rating and WELL Equity Rating.

    Is renterâs insurance required?

    Yes, a minimum coverage of $100,000 is required. All leaseholders must be listed on the insurance policy.

    Are residents required to pay a security deposit? If so, how much is it?

    Yes, residents must pay a security deposit between $1,000 and a month and a half of rent.
